name: Eye-Mutant Orb Laser
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Eyemutant Eye" "204974" #L "Drum of Hydrochloric Acid" "156051" #L "Field Quantum Physics All-Purpose Tool" "164558" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Drum of Hydrochloric Acid + Eyemutant Eye = #L "Inactive Eyemutant Orb Laser" "204976" Skills: | CH | ------------------------------ Field Quantum Physics All-Purpose Tool + Inactive Eyemutant Orb Laser = #L "Eyemutant Orb Laser" "204972" Skills: | CH | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Another reason to kill those annoying eyemutants :)
